INIT().details: This function is called when the module is installed or upgraded by the kernel.MUST BE GATED BY onlyKernel. Used to encompass any initialization or upgrade logic.

returns.major: - Major version upgrade indicates breaking change to the interface.
returns.minor: - Minor version change retains backward-compatible interface.

requireRole(bytes32,address).details: Roles are defined in the policy and granted by the ROLES admin.

VERSION().notice: Returns which semantic version of a module is being implemented.

changeKernel(address).notice: Function used by kernel when migrating to a new kernel.

ensureValidRole(bytes32).notice: Function that checks if role is valid (all lower case)

hasRole(address,bytes32).notice: Mapping for if an address has a policy-defined role.

removeRole(bytes32,address).notice: Function to revoke policy-defined roles from some address. Can only be called by admin.

requireRole(bytes32,address).notice: "Modifier" to restrict policy function access to certain addresses with a role.

saveRole(bytes32,address).notice: Function to grant policy-defined roles to some address. Can only be called by admin.

documentation.text: @notice Mapping for if an address has a policy-defined role.
@notice Function to grant policy-defined roles to some address. Can only be called by admin.
@notice Function to revoke policy-defined roles from some address. Can only be called by admin.

@notice "Modifier" to restrict policy function access to certain addresses with a role.
 @dev    Roles are defined in the policy and granted by the ROLES admin.
@notice Function that checks if role is valid (all lower case)
